log_metadata.purpose: Track false positive rate across POP observer cycles for controller activation evidence
log_metadata.target_threshold: 0.0 false positives required for controller promotion

cycle_logs.validation_notes: Baseline observer sweep completed with no enforcement findings. No false positives possible with zero findings.
Validation run with PIK advisory checks active. All findings corroborated by PIK. No false positives detected.
Confirmation cycle with full S0-S5 layer stack. All metrics validated. No false positives across any layer integration.

verification_methodology.description: Each POP finding is cross-referenced with multiple validation sources to detect false positives
false_positive_criteria: POP flags cycle that does not exist in actual execution
POP flags gate skip when prerequisites were satisfied
POP flags version drift when schemas match
Finding cannot be reproduced via manual inspection

causal_replay_note.context: Causal replay simulation detected 8 cycle patterns in protocol handoff documentation
causal_replay_note.explanation: These cycles exist in documented handoff relationships and require governance resolution. POP correctly identified them during simulation. Observer mode did not flag them at runtime because no protocols were executed with enforcement enabled.

blockers: Cycle detection in causal replay requires resolution (Phase 1)
